title: Boy who was shot in the face has died
content:
A 5-year-old boy who was shot in the face at a northwest Harris County home has died, a medical examiner confirmed.
The boy was shot after he got into his uncle’s bedroom with two other children and found a gun Tuesday night in the 9700 block of Shady Tree Lane near Fallbrook Drive and Highway 249.
The boy’s mother rushed him to Willowbrook Methodist Hospital and he was later taken by Life Flight to Memorial Hermann Hospital in the Medical Center.
Investigators with the Harris County Sheriff’s Office said it appears to be an accidental shooting but their investigation is ongoing.
